name: AcuteOrEvolvingMI
title: Acute or Evolving MI
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains the disorders used to identify patients with an acute or evolving myocardial infarction.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with an acute or evolving myocardial infarction. Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element would map to the result attribute.),(Inclusion Criteria: Include codes that describe the disorder acute myocardial infarction, acute Q-wave infarction, and acute ST-segment myocardial infarction.),(Exclusion Criteria: Exclude codes that describe non-Q-wave myocardial infarction and non-ST-elevation myocardial infarction.)
